name: Incandescent
blurb: Headquarters for the Communion of the Lantern King in the heart of the Death Basin
people: Solaris Leon van Daal: Dwarven Leader of the Communion of the Lantern King. Covered in scars that he wears with prides, he galvanizes his people with his cut-throat mentality and strong convictions.
misc: Bless the Lantern King and those he illuminates
